sourcesContent: import "../../styles/components/roundchart.css" import { RadialBarChart , RadialBar , ResponsiveContainer , PolarAngleAxis } from "recharts" import { useRef } from "react" function RoundChart ({input}) { let achievement = (input.score)*100 let tab = [{score:achievement,fill:"red"}] const windowWidth = useRef(window.innerHeight).current console.log(windowWidth) return ( Score 1024) ? "70%" : "60%"} outerRadius="100%" barSize={(windowWidth>1024) ? 15 : 8} data={tab} startAngle={90} endAngle={450}> 1024) ? "33%" : "26%"} /> 1024) ? -16 : -12}>{achievement}% 1024) ? -58 : -40} dy={(windowWidth>1024) ? 22 : 18}>de votre 1024) ? -62 : -41} dy={(windowWidth>1024) ? 22 : 18}>objectif ) } export default RoundChart
